bookText.htmlContent: Although tending to shun Dominion itself, sheep-morphs are very commonly found working on farms in the Foloi Fields. A woolly body, with the possibility of having curled horns, is usually enough to identify someone as a sheep-morph.

Just like most common races, the personality of sheep-morphs varies wildly from individual to individual. That being said, they do have a tendency for being quite cowardly, and will often flee from physical conflict instead of trying to fight. They also have an instinct to form flocks, which leads to a lot of sheep-morphs being quite kind and friendly to one another.

Along with cow, horse, and goat-morphs, sheep-morphs form the core of the workforce in most of the farms found scattered throughout the Foloi Fields. As well as being able to provide physical labour, sheep-morphs are able to make some extra money by selling their wool to the farm. Due to the care which is taken in its maintenance and grooming, a sheep-morph's wool is of much higher quality, and therefore a lot more valuable, than a regular sheep's.

Sheep-morphs, like the other common races, get heavily affected by arcane storms. Being exposed to arcane thunder will make sheep-boys seek out a partner to mate with, while sheep-girls will go into heat.

A sheep-morph's offspring will be a mixture of sheep-morphs and offspring of their partner's race.
